repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: UNITE Local 169 Amalgamated Northeast Regional Joint Board Photographs

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Union of Needletrades, Industrial and Textile Employees (UNITE)

did.abstract: This collection includes photographs from the Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union (ACTWU), Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America (ACWA), Textile Workers Union of America (TWUA), and Union of Needletrades, Industrial and Textile Employees (UNITE).

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: UNITE, the Union of Needle Trades, Industrial, and Textile Employees was formed in 1995 after a merger between the International Ladies' Garment Workers Union (ILGWU) and the Amalgamated Clothing and Textile Workers Union (ACTWU).
In 2004 they announced they would merge with the Hotel Employees and Restaurant Employees Union (HERE) which created UNITE HERE.
Jay Mazur served as president of UNITE from its beginning until his retirement in 2001. Bruce Raynor was elected president at that time and served until the HERE merger.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UNITE Local 169 Amalgamated Northeast Regional Joint Board Photographs #6000/016 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5619/014: ACWA Local 169 Files 5619/014: ACWA Local 169 Files 6000/016: UNITE Local 169 Files 6000/016 MB: UNITE Local 169 Amalgamated Northeast Regional Joint Board Memorabilia Banners 6200/001: UNITE HERE Local 169 Files
